alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 11 at 4:14AM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following county, Inyo. * WHEN...Until 715 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 414 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms near Owens Lake. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen in the nearby higher terrain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lone Pine, Olancha, Independence, Diaz Lake, Keeler, Portagee Lake Campground, Tuttle Creek Campground, Cartago, Whitney Portal Campground, Independence Creek Campground and Onion Valley Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
